question: Mohammad Bin Tughlaq ruled the Delhi sultanate during which of the following periods?
explanation: Mohammad Bin Tughlaq also known as Jauna Khan, was the second ruler of the Tughlaq dynasty. He ascended the throne in 1325 CE after the death of his father Ghiyasuddin Tughlaq. he ruled the Delhi sultanate from 1325 CE to 1351 CE.
